changeSet.author: alex
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `sensor_data` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `data` double DEFAULT NULL, `device_id` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `sensor_id` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `date` datetime(6) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=421 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;
